text.content:
Grappled

Source: XPHB, page 367

While you have the Grappled condition, you experience the following effects. Your Speed|XPHB is 0 and can't increase.You have Disadvantage|XPHB on attack rolls against any target other than the grappler.The grappler can drag or carry you when it moves, but every foot of movement costs it 1 extra foot unless you are Tiny or two or more sizes smaller than it.
